name: Jump n Run (HANZALA1)
description:
Name:- Jump n Run

This is my first 2D game I have Made. Play This And Stay tuned for updates.

This is an 2D Platformer in this game you have to go to the checkpoint to compelete the game.There are two level which are quiet hard so compelete it if you are a pro.

Download:- https://hanzala1.itch.io/jump-n-run
